name: One Night at Teki's
description:
This game is an inside joke. Don't take it seriously.

Here's how to play it:

  • Tevi (the pink one) will jumpscare if you don't close the doors in enough time everytime you pull up the monitor. 
  • Geary (the beige one) will jumpscare you if you don't put on the mask immediately when he shows up. 
  • Endoki (the red one) will jumpscare you if you don't pull up the monitor every 6 or 4 seconds (I can't remember lol) .
  • Teki (the blue one) jumpscares you at the end of the night.

You can download the game on Gamejolt too. That's where I put media, updates and (possibly) sequels first. https://gamejolt.com/games/onat/698370
